DataElement.preferredName: Neuropsychology Behavioral Assessment Administered Yes No Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no/not applicable indicator for whether the neuropsychological and/or behavioral battery was administered

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A branch of psychology which investigates the correlation between experience or behavior and the basic neurophysiological processes. The term neuropsychology stresses the dominant role of the nervous system. It is a more narrowly defined field than physiological psychology or psychophysiology._Assessment of individual responses to age appropriate stimuli._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A branch of psychology which investigates the correlation between experience or behavior and the basic neurophysiological processes. The term neuropsychology stresses the dominant role of the nervous system. It is a more narrowly defined field than physiological psychology or psychophysiology.:Assessment of individual responses to age appropriate stimuli.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The study of how the physiology of the brain and central nervous system are related to behavior.
Assessment of individual responses to age appropriate stimuli.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.
